v1COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS.description:
COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS 发布状态.

 - COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_INIT: COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_INIT 构建中.
 - COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_PROCESS: COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_PROCESS 发布中.
 - COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_FINISH: COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_FINISH 发布完成.
 - COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_FAIL: COURSE_PUBLISH_STATUS_FAIL 发布失败.
